title: Chvrches.Coachella.Festival.2014.MPEG2.AC3.1080p
description:
I downloaded this entire festival quite a while ago (20 odd Gigs) and apparently this was the only act I decided to keep!

Previously I'd had this as a single file but decided to break it up into single tracks A) for general convenience as well as B) the fact that there were audio sync problems with some of the songs. That seems to have disappeared by splitting them up.

Here is the track list (complete show had 11 tracks):
-----------------------------------------------------
1. We Sink
2. Recover
3. Tether
4. Under The Tide
5. The Mother We Share

Here is an example of the video quality (which is extremely high IMHO):

For those with "weak" machines (like me!):
------------------------------------------
I found optimal playback on my Win7 machine by using "libavcodec" [media type: Either one of or both "MPEG in AVI" and "Other MPEG2"] and turning "use speed-up tricks" ON. The next best option, LAV decoder with "internal MPEG2" set (for MPC-HC.exe), was not nearly as smooth.

- user101966
